verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> spake אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> And God אֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <WH1697> all these words הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying ס

אָֽנֹכִ֖י֙ <WH595> I יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑֔יךָ <WH430> thy God אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> who הוֹצֵאתִ֛יךָ <WH3318> which have brought מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> thee out of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt מִבֵּ֣֥ית <WH1004> out of the house עֲבָדִֽ֑ים׃ <WH5650> of bondage
לֹֽ֣א <WH3808> no יִהְיֶֽה־ <WH1961> shall have לְךָ֛֩ אֱלֹהִ֥֨ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֖֜ים <WH312> Thou shalt have no other עַל־ <WH5921> before פָּנָֽ֗יַ <WH6440> before me

לֹֽ֣א <WH3808> shall not תַֽעֲשֶׂ֨ה־ <WH6213> Thou shalt not make לְךָ֥֣ פֶ֣֙סֶל֙ ׀ <WH6459> unto thee any graven image וְכָל־ <WH3605> any תְּמוּנָ֡֔ה <WH8544> or any likeness אֲשֶׁ֤֣ר <WH834> [of any thing] that בַּשָּׁמַ֣֙יִם֙ ׀ <WH8064> [is] in heaven מִמַּ֡֔עַל <WH4605> above וַֽאֲשֶׁ֥ר֩ <WH834> of what בָּאָ֖֨רֶץ <WH776> or that [is] in the earth מִתַָּ֑֜חַת <WH8478> beneath וַאֲשֶׁ֥֣ר <WH834> of what בַּמַּ֖֣יִם ׀ <WH4325> beneath or that [is] in the water מִתַּ֥֣חַת <WH8478> under לָאָֽ֗רֶץ <WH776> under the earth

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תִשְׁתַּחְוֶ֥֣ה <WH7812> Thou shalt not bow down לָהֶ֖ם֮ וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> or תָעָבְדֵ֑ם֒ <WH5647> thyself to them nor serve כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אָֽנֹכִ֞י <WH595> I יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> them for I the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God אֵ֣ל <WH410> God קַנָּ֔א <WH7067> [am] a jealous פֹּ֠קֵד <WH6485> visiting עֲוֹ֨ן <WH5771> the iniquity אָבֹ֧ת <WH1> of the fathers עַל־ <WH5921> on בָּנִ֛ים <WH1121> upon the children עַל־ <WH5921> on שִׁלֵּשִׁ֥ים <WH8029> unto the third וְעַל־ <WH5921> and רִבֵּעִ֖ים <WH7256> and fourth לְשֹׂנְאָֽ֑י׃ <WH8130> [generation] of them that hate

וְעֹ֥֤שֶׂה <WH6213> And shewing חֶ֖֙סֶד֙ <WH2617> mercy לַאֲלָפִ֑֔ים <WH505> unto thousands לְאֹהֲבַ֖י <WH157> of them that love וּלְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <WH8104> me and keep מִצְוֹתָֽי׃ <WH4687> my commandments ס

לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תִשָּׂ֛א <WH5375> Thou shalt not take אֶת־ <WH853> שֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> the name יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God לַשָּׁ֑וְא <WH7723> in vain כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֤א <WH3808> will not יְנַקֶּה֙ <WH5352> will not hold him guiltless יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> for the LORD אֵ֛ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יִשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> that taketh אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> his name לַשָּֽׁוְא׃ <WH7723> in vain פ
זָכ֛וֹר֩ <WH2142> Remember אֶת־ <WH853> י֥֨וֹם <WH3117> day הַשַּׁבָּ֖֜ת <WH7676> the sabbath לְקַדְּשֽׁ֗וֹ <WH6942> to keep it holy
שֵׁ֤֣שֶׁת <WH8337> Six יָמִ֣ים֙ <WH3117> days תַּֽעֲבֹ֔ד֮ <WH5647> shalt thou labour וְעָשִׂ֖֣יתָ <WH6213> and do כָּל־ <WH3605> all מְלַאכְתֶּֽךָ֒ <WH4399> all thy work

וְי֙וֹם֙ <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔֜י <WH7637> But the seventh שַׁבָּ֖֣ת ׀ <WH7676> [is] the sabbath לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑֗יךָ <WH430> thy God לֹֽ֣א־ <WH3808> shall not תַעֲשֶׂ֣֨ה <WH6213> [in it] thou shalt not do כָל־ <WH3605> any מְלָאכָ֡֜ה <WH4399> any work אַתָּ֣ה ׀ <WH859> you וּבִנְךָֽ֣־ <WH1121> thou nor thy son וּ֠בִתֶּ֗ךָ <WH1323> nor thy daughter עַבְדְּךָ֤֨ <WH5650> thy manservant וַאֲמָֽתְךָ֜֙ <WH519> nor thy maidservant וּבְהֶמְתֶּ֔֗ךָ <WH929> nor thy cattle וְגֵרְךָ֖֙ <WH1616> nor thy stranger אֲשֶׁ֥֣ר <WH834> who בִּשְׁעָרֶֽ֔יךָ <WH8179> that [is] within thy gates

כִּ֣י <WH3588> in שֵֽׁשֶׁת־ <WH8337> For [in] six יָמִים֩ <WH3117> days עָשָׂ֨ה <WH6213> made יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> heaven וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> and earth אֶת־ <WH853> הַיָּם֙ <WH3220> the sea וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after בָּ֔ם וַיָּ֖נַח <WH5117> and all that in them [is] and rested בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֑י <WH7637> the seventh עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> after that בֵּרַ֧ךְ <WH1288> blessed יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> wherefore the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> י֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַשַּׁבָּ֖ת <WH7676> the sabbath וַֽיְקַדְּשֵֽׁהוּ׃ <WH6942> and hallowed ס

כַּבֵּ֥ד <WH3513> Honour אֶת־ <WH853> אָבִ֖יךָ <WH1> thy father וְאֶת־ <WH853> אִמֶּ֑ךָ <WH517> and thy mother לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> because of יַאֲרִכ֣וּן <WH748> may be long יָמֶ֔יךָ <WH3117> that thy days עַ֚ל <WH5921> in הָאֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> upon the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> giveth לָֽךְ׃ ס
לֹ֥֖א <WH3808> shall not תִּֿרְצָֽ֖ח׃ <WH7523> Thou shalt not kill ס
לֹ֣֖א <WH3808> shall not תִּֿנְאָֽ֑ף׃ <WH5003> Thou shalt not commit adultery ס
לֹ֣֖א <WH3808> shall not תִּֿגְנֹֽ֔ב׃ <WH1589> Thou shalt not steal ס
לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תַעֲנֶ֥ה <WH6030> Thou shalt not bear בְרֵעֲךָ֖ <WH7453> against thy neighbour עֵ֥ד <WH5707> witness שָֽׁקֶר׃ <WH8267> false. ס

לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תַחְמֹ֖ד <WH2530> Thou shalt not covet בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house רֵעֶ֑ךָ <WH7453> thy neighbour's לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תַחְמֹ֞ד <WH2530> thou shalt not covet אֵ֣שֶׁת <WH802> wife רֵעֶ֗ךָ <WH7453> thy neighbour's וְעַבְדּ֤וֹ <WH5650> nor his manservant וַאֲמָתוֹ֙ <WH519> nor his maidservant וְשׁוֹר֣וֹ <WH7794> nor his ox וַחֲמֹר֔וֹ <WH2543> nor his ass וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> anything אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> that לְרֵעֶֽךָ׃ <WH7453> nor any thing that [is] thy neighbour's פ

וְכָל־ <WH3605> All הָעָם֩ <WH5971> And all the people רֹאִ֨ים <WH7200> saw אֶת־ <WH853> הַקּוֹלֹ֜ת <WH6963> the thunderings וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַלַּפִּידִ֗ם <WH3940> and the lightnings וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ק֣וֹל <WH6963> and the noise הַשֹּׁפָ֔ר <WH7782> of the trumpet וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָהָ֖ר <WH2022> and the mountain עָשֵׁ֑ן <WH6226> smoking וַיַּ֤רְא <WH7200> saw הָעָם֙ <WH5971> and when the people וַיָּנֻ֔עוּ <WH5128> [it] they removed וַיַּֽעַמְד֖וּ <WH5975> and stood מֵֽרָחֹֽק׃ <WH7350> afar off

וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> And they said אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses דַּבֵּר־ <WH1696> Speak אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> yourself עִמָּ֖נוּ <WH5973> and we וְנִשְׁמָ֑עָה <WH8085> thou with us and we will hear וְאַל־ <WH408> nay יְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> speak עִמָּ֛נוּ <WH5973> not אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> but let not God פֶּן־ <WH6435> or נָמֽוּת׃ <WH4191> with us lest we die

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָם֮ <WH5971> unto the people אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָאוּ֒ <WH3372> Fear כִּ֗י <WH3588> in לְבַֽעֲבוּר֙ <WH5668> to נַסּ֣וֹת <WH5254> prove אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> בָּ֖א <WH935> is come הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> not for God וּבַעֲב֗וּר <WH5668> order תִּהְיֶ֧ה <WH1961> become יִרְאָת֛וֹ <WH3374> you and that his fear עַל־ <WH5921> may be before פְּנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH6440> may be before your faces לְבִלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> you may not תֶחֱטָֽאוּ׃ <WH2398> that ye sin

וַיַּעֲמֹ֥ד <WH5975> stood הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> And the people מֵרָחֹ֑ק <WH7350> afar off וּמֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> and Moses נִגַּ֣שׁ <WH5066> drew near אֶל־ <WH413> about הָֽעֲרָפֶ֔ל <WH6205> unto the thick darkness אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> in it הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> where God פ

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus תֹאמַ֖ר <WH559> Thus thou shalt say אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you רְאִיתֶ֔ם <WH7200> Ye have seen כִּ֚י <WH3588> for מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> with you from heaven דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <WH1696> that I have talked עִמָּכֶֽם׃ <WH5973> with

לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תַעֲשׂ֖וּן <WH6213> Ye shall not make אִתִּ֑י <WH854> besides אֱלֹ֤הֵי <WH430> with me gods כֶ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> of silver וֵאלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> unto you gods זָהָ֔ב <WH2091> of gold לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תַעֲשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> neither shall ye make לָכֶֽם׃

מִזְבַּ֣ח <WH4196> An altar אֲדָמָה֮ <WH127> of earth תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> thou shalt make לִּי֒ וְזָבַחְתָּ֣ <WH2076> unto me and shalt sacrifice עָלָ֗יו <WH5921> and אֶת־ <WH853> עֹלֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5930> thereon thy burnt offerings וְאֶת־ <WH853> שְׁלָמֶ֔יךָ <WH8002> and thy peace offerings אֶת־ <WH853> צֹֽאנְךָ֖ <WH6629> thy sheep וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּקָרֶ֑ךָ <WH1241> and thine oxen בְּכָל־ <WH3605> every הַמָּקוֹם֙ <WH4725> in all places אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> where אַזְכִּ֣יר <WH2142> where I record אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמִ֔י <WH8034> my name אָב֥וֹא <WH935> I will come אֵלֶ֖יךָ <WH413> to you וּבֵרַכְתִּֽיךָ׃ <WH1288> unto thee and I will bless

וְאִם־ <WH518> If מִזְבַּ֤ח <WH4196> me an altar אֲבָנִים֙ <WH68> of stone תַּֽעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> And if thou wilt make לִּ֔י לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תִבְנֶ֥ה <WH1129> thou shalt not build אֶתְהֶ֖ן <WH853> גָּזִ֑ית <WH1496> it of hewn stone כִּ֧י <WH3588> for חַרְבְּךָ֛ <WH2719> thy tool הֵנַ֥פְתָּ <WH5130> for if thou lift up עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> on וַתְּחַֽלְלֶֽהָ׃ <WH2490> upon it thou hast polluted

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not תַעֲלֶ֥ה <WH5927> Neither shalt thou go up בְמַעֲלֹ֖ת <WH4609> by steps עַֽל־ <WH5921> unto מִזְבְּחִ֑י <WH4196> unto mine altar אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> so לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not תִגָּלֶ֥ה <WH1540> be not discovered עֶרְוָתְךָ֖ <WH6172> that thy nakedness עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and פ
